name: mt-2020
description: Work in progress news app for parsing & presenting candidate data for the 2020 Montana election cycle.

scripts.refresh: npm run fetch:text && npm run fetch:links && npm run refresh:data
scripts.deploy:demo: (cd app && gatsby build) && aws s3 sync app/public s3://mtfp-election-demo
scripts.deploy:prod-tk: cd app && gatsby build --prefix-paths && aws s3 sync public s3://apps.montanafreepress.org/montana-2020
scripts.deploy:prod: (cd app; gatsby build --prefix-paths && rm -r ./montana-2020 ||: && mv ./public ./montana-2020 && lftp -c "open sftp://ericdietrich@sftp.flywheelsites.com/mtfpeditor/montana-free-press/apps; mirror -eR montana-2020/")

author: Eric Dietrich / Montana Free Press
